reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Scoping Study to assess the potential for partnerships to deliver infrastructure projects in developing countries along the Belt and Road corridor

description.narrative: This project is designed to promote prosperity partnerships and support the sustainability of China's contribution to economic growth in developing countries along the Belt and Road corridor. It will provide an evidence base for a report to determine priority regions and countries, including where the UK-China Infrastructure Alliance might set up satellite offices. This project will lay groundwork for the Infrastructure pillar of the forthcoming China prosperity programme. This pillar will promote the involvement of international best practice in design, engineering, financial, professional and legal services, and environmental and social standards in growth enhancing Chinese led projects.
